Name: TacitRed-LogicApp-Ingestion
Author: TacitRed - support@tacitred.com
Description: The TacitRed Logic App Ingestion solution uses a Logic App with managed identity to poll TacitRed's API and ingest compromised credential findings into Microsoft Sentinel via the Logs Ingestion API. Includes analytics rules for detecting repeat compromises, high-risk users, and cross-feed correlation.
